"Hey Family!üéâüôåüî•üî•\n\nWe would like to give a little explanation about our designs and logos. What do they mean? Where they come from?: "
Why the Acorn?üå∞\nIt represents the project birth, an Illusion. A way to go.
Why the Abubilla?üê¶\nIt\'s an extension of us, our link with the nature and animal conscious. This our wildest side and at the same the time the most responsible one.
Why the Holm Oak?üå≥\nIt\'s the Family, roots and our sign of identity. Perfect photonsyntesis between our dreams and the RollinPeople.

This would not have been possible without our designers @gloevolutionsoccer and @drty.dsgn.
Thank you for bringing life and color to all our crazy things.

Thanks a million for bringing us to life!

# RollinPeople
Click on the video to play it
The user does not exist in our database. Make sure you are entering it correctly or sign up if you are not. :)

Roll in Bass is a reality that is born from the illusion of a family.üôÇ

Each of us has grown hand in hand with drum and bass, break and dubstep music. In love with the broken rhythms and their BPM. When we talk about a team, we talk about a group, and when we talk about a group, illusions, goals and objectives come into play.
A family.‚ù§‚ù§

It is said that when a person is constant and has a goal, in one way or another, sooner or later he will achieve it as a result of work. Now we want to achieve that goal among all of us. We would like to share with everyone our vision and the BPM we beat at all the volume we can.
We will be accompanied by local artists, from the land, young and with origin denomination. Both national and international, bringing novelty and freshness to the scene, promoting it hand in hand with all these artists.üéßüéµ

SEE YOU AT THE SOUNDSYSTEMüî•üôåüî•üôå!!


Connect to #RollinPeople:

"NOTICE OF TEMPORARY SUSPENSION OF EVENTS:


Due to the current situation and the measures taken in the party and event places by the different administrations to prevent the spread of the virus, we communicate the suspension of events until the situation improves and We can offer a service according to the level we want to give.

Sending you strength and encouragement to overcome these difficult times.‚ù§ üéß "

BL4KO

Dj from Cordoba, co-founder of Roll in Bass who currently resides in Leeds (UK).
Since he was young he has been influenced by the DnB movement, both nationally and internationally. His main influences were Neurofunk and Jump Up and over time he submerged himself in sub-genres such as Deep, Tech-Step, Rollers or Liquid, which are reflected in his mixes.

It was in 2017 when he decided to enter this world, starting to mix at home as a hobby and DJing at private parties.
Little by little, it became a reality and in September 2019 he had the opportunity to perform at The Old Red Bus Station (Leeds), which has featured great artists from the English scene.\n\nNow he returns to Spain wanting to show everything he has learned and make it even bigger. "

COOLBOX

One of the familys youngest.

His passion for D&B begins at a young age, where the influence of his parents and the rave scene make him want to be part of this world since he was a kid.
Being welcomed by the wellknown Alharave collective, he begins to share his music in various events, parties and music festivals through the provinces of Malaga, Seville, and Granada: Industrial Copera, Paris15, El Tren, Palladium, Prisma, Cosmos , Sala Route 69, Quilombo, Red Zone, etc.
Throughout his career, he has shared cabin with renowned bigname DJs such as DLR, Gerra & Stone, Ill Truth, Data 3, Philth, LSB, Document One, Dj Limited, Levela, Black Barrel‚Ä¶ His vision of D&B takes him to her sets, always full of freshest and underground sounds from Rolling Deep, Jump up Rollers, Deep Rollers & Jungle achieving an exquisite result. He also collaborates with other collectives like Zero2 Soul and Alharave promoting the scene and his taste for music.

ACORN

We are talking about a 24 year old young man from Madrid living in Malaga.

His first contact with electronic music was in 2012 with Breakbeat and its broken rhythms, but it was not until 2015 that his passion for D&B and the beats of Neurofunk. Hand in hand with his musical maturity he began to have contact with Deep, Roller, Techstep. Its striking, dark and atmospheric sounds led him to fall in love with these styles, being reflected in the result of his sets.

This artists debut was in October 2018, and his little journey has passed through the well-known Paris15 and the familiar Route69. On his way, he has shared a booth with artists of international stature such as Teddy Killerz and Dub Elements.

BLNK

This young DJ from the Cadiz Mountains is passionate about hard drums and speedy rhythm. His style encompasses subgenres of Drum & Bass like Techstep, Deep, Neuro and a Roller touch. His sets are always accompanied by reggae, jazz vocals,rap etc.
He has performed in various partys & raves among Andalusia.
In C√°diz at Sala Holiday, Sala Pokoloco,Sala La Comedia (Jerez), in Seville in Sala Prisma and in C√≥rdoba in Sala M100; also he has shared cabin with artists like Dub Elements.

ELUX

Young guy from Malaga who started in the electronic music scene in 2010 with his broken rhythms.
It was then in 2014 when he met the D&B thanks to the Rave clubs and events throughout Andalusia. Reaching its musical maturity, he begins to elaborate his first mixes just in 2019 under the aka ELUX, and that despite his brief experience in mixing, he contains a great selection and D&B culture.
A Roller vibes, strongly marked by a dark bass line and strong drums, together with the atmospheric touch of his selection, characterizes and gives the artist a unique identity.

About his career, he has been fortunate to be able to take his music to the well-known Prisma Hall in Seville and various clubs and Rave events in Malaga and Granada.

GUNPOWDER

When we talk about Gunpowder we are talking about a young man who started in the world of D&B in 2016, where he began to attend various events, venues and festivals.
His love for the darkest and deepest lines was born discovering them in the underground scene.

It was in the Summer of 2019 when his first mixes were seen on cdj players and where he advanced at gigantic rates thanks to the help and support of his closest people.
Now it is when the trend of his sessions will be recognized, showing his passion for Rollers and Deep within the D&B, strongly characterized in his mixes where long mixes predominate, accompanied by double-drops and a serious and forceful line.
About his experience, he has performed in various events and festivals in the province of Malaga, Granada, and in well-known clubs such as Sala Prisma in Seville.

Gunpowder also collaborates with other collectives such as the well-known Alharave, much loved by many of us.

MINIMAL DRAMA

This artist From C√≥rdoba, Roll in Bass member and one of it ºs cofounders, began to show an interest in D&B ºs roots from his continued contact with the Andalusian scene from 2015 and after with the underground British scene, where he was a resident for a long time.

He began to take his first steps in the world of mixing at various private parties in the UK, where he maintains close contact with British D&B.
His style, where he likes to play between 172/175bpm, is clearly marked with Deep Minimal, Liquid, Tech Step, Rolling and Neurofunk, creating a dynamic atmosphere of strong bass, achieving a very personal result.

SETE & LILAK

Sete & Lilak are a young spanish dj duo who also happen to be siblings.
In their hometown they have cautivated the ears of so many ravers over the past two years with their fast paced sets. They rush over the decks from the filthiest neurofunk to the deepest rollers also going through bouncing jump up and even some emotional dancefloor bangers.

ROLL97

He is a new upcoming artist in the scene of the Drum and Bass, born in Malaga (Spain) where he get that chill and liquid vibe and living in Bristol (UK) where he get that "Deep & Rolling vibe", he has been working on his mixes for long time ago with a brilliant technique in the mix and mad skills on double drops and an excellent EQ of the tracks.

Also he started his productions one year ago with bid advances with forthcomings EP's in Tesseract Recordings(Yorkshire), Counterpoints Records(Portugal), Sixteen Step Records(Bristol), GhosBass Records(Sevilla), CST Records(Sevilla).
Roll97 has played in events with artist like Octo Pi, Audiomission , Lupo ,Oto ,Incus , Nixxon ,Sam Harris, Master &Disaster , Optimus ,Vandermou ,Sonar ,Adverse ,Mahza, Low Health.
This new artist will sound in the coming years and will be recognized for his dynamic drum games, accompanied by conversations between synthbass, and his marked funky rhythms that are hardly recognizable by very moving and vocal percussions that complete a perfect mix between Deep, Funky, Rolling and Liquid Drum and Bass.
